<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="">[Broken Tusk Recruiter](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=289)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Quest for the Frozen Flame Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=110) pg. 8</row>

</column>

Your gifted tongue, friendly demeanor, and deep knowledge of Broken Tusk culture and traditions make you an ideal recruiter for new followers. Whenever Broken Tusks come upon weak, weary, or wandering souls, you're often the first sent to meet these folks and determine if they would be a good fit for the following.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill, and the [Hillcross Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Group Impression](/Feats.aspx?ID=789) skill feat.
name: Broken Tusk Recruiter
